mapper.select: select p.pnum , p.ptext , DATE_FORMAT(p.pdatetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') AS PDATETIME , p.user_num , length(p.pphoto) AS FILESIZE , a.unick AS user_nick , (select count(*) from comment where post_num = p.pnum) AS COMMENTCNT , (select count(*) from likes where post_pnum = p.pnum) AS LIKECNT , p.user_num from post p , account a where 1 = 1 and p.user_num = a.unum order by pnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into post (ptext, pdatetime, pphoto, user_num, pdatetime_modified) values(#{ptext}, now(), #{fileContent}, #{user_num}, now())
mapper.select: select p.pnum , p.ptext , DATE_FORMAT(p.pdatetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') AS PDATETIME , p.pphoto AS FILECONTENT , (select profile from myPage where user_num = p.user_num) AS PROFILECONTENT , p.user_num , a.unick AS user_nick , p.pdatetime_modified , (select count(*) from comment where post_num = p.pnum) AS COMMENTCNT , (select count(*) from likes where post_pnum = p.pnum) AS LIKECNT , length(p.pphoto) AS FILESIZE from post p , account a where p.user_num = a.unum and p.pnum = #{pnum}
